name: mcp-sap-docs

scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run build:index && npm run build:fts
scripts.test: npm run test:url-generation && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:url-generation: npm run build:tsc && npx vitest run test/comprehensive-url-generation.test.ts test/prompts.test.ts test/software-heroes-afm.test.ts
scripts.test:url-generation:debug: npm run build:tsc && DEBUG_TESTS=true npx vitest run test/comprehensive-url-generation.test.ts
scripts.test:mcp-urls: npm run build:tsc && npx vitest run test/mcp-search-url-verification.test.ts
scripts.test:integration:urls: npm run build && node test/tools/run-tests.js --spec search-url-verification.js
scripts.test:urls:status: npm run build:tsc && npx tsx test/url-status.ts
scripts.setup:submodules: bash -lc 'git submodule sync --recursive && git submodule update --init --recursive --depth 1 && git submodule status --recursive'
scripts.test:software-heroes: npm run build:tsc && npx vitest run test/software-heroes-afm.test.ts test/software-heroes-content-search.test.ts
scripts.test:fetch-sap-help: npm run build:tsc && npx vitest run test/fetch-sap-help.test.ts

description: Offline SAP documentation MCP server with unified local + online search
